create.heading: Create a passkey
paragraphs: A passkey is a simple, secure replacement for your password that is stored safely on your device.
It allows you to sign in using just your fingerprint, face scan, or PIN, meaning you will not need to type in a password or extra verification codes.

success.heading: Passkey successfully created
paragraphs: You have successfully created a passkey and it will be available to use next time you sign in.
